mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY (COM_SEQ, TITLE, ID, CONTENT, REGDATE, HIT, LIKES, TYPE) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM COMMUNITY), #{title}, #{id}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{hit}, #{likes}, #{type}) INSERT INTO COMM_INTERIOR (COM_SEQ, FILE_IMAGE, P_NUM) VALUES (#{type}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM COMM_INTERIOR), #{file_image}, #{p_num})
